mapper.select: SELECT id id, time time, name name, mobile mobile, password password, password_continue_fails passwordContinueFails, is_password_locked isPasswordLocked, password_locked_time passwordLockedTime, is_allow_login isAllowLogin, lock_time lockTime, login_count loginCount, last_login_time lastLoginTime, last_login_client lastLoginClient, last_login_ip lastLoginIp, type type, platform_account platformAccount, is_freeSigningContract isFreeSigningContract FROM t_user user
